mean_cn: v. 检疫，隔离，使隔离；  n. 检疫，隔离，检疫期，封锁
mean_en: to keep (a person or animal) away from others to prevent a disease from spreading :to put or keep (a person or animal) in quarantine
word_etyma: quarant检疫+ine表示抽象名词 →隔离检查
sentence: Patients with infectious diseases should be quarantined; only medical workers should enter.
sentence_trans: 传染病病患者将被隔离起来，只有医护人员能入内。
